Title: WPFModalDialog
Description: Custom modal dialog in Wpf, contains basic controls in dialog window, also allow you to inform user about loading operations, using animated watcher
HomeWiki:
Sometimes you have to replace basic MessageBox with something custom and beauty

This one allows you to use basic dialog window in familiar way (just like MessageBox), but with few advantages:

  • Custom dialog window style
  • New type of message - loading progress indicator: allow you to run background process while dialog window shown, and inform user about success or fail in the end right in dialog window
